pages.text: One would be forgiven for assuming that a $(item)Broken Watch$() isn't of much use. However, preserving one using $(l:things:items/gleaming_materials)Gleaming Compound$() turns out to have a positive outcome for any active $(thing)Potion Effects$(). In fact, it $(thing)extends their duration by 50%$(). Given the immense force required for breaking a $(item)Clock$(), simply using a $(thing)Crafting Table$() is not an option. Instead, throw some $(item)Leather$(), a $(item)Clock$() as well as a piece of
$(thing)Gleaming Compound$() onto the ground and $(thing)crush them with a piston$().
